name: I am many
description:
Description
This is a short 3D Puzzle Game made for the ZenoJam 4 with the topic "I am everywhere".
This was my first 3D Game ever made and also my first 3D Game ever. 

Goal
Find all 3 colored cubes and restore them to their designated Area, to find and open up the yellow door.

Controls
WASD and Mouse to move
Left Mouse Button to pick up and drop cubes
1,2,3 - Change between Characters
C - Get a top view of the map
